thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 123 of 7354
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: The B&H website is easy to navigate. They carry quality products and provide the information I need to select what I need. Prices are pretty much the same or less than I have seen elsewhere. The free expedited shipping via UPS or FedEx is a big plus for me. This was not my first time ordering from B&H. I have been pleased with their service in the past, and I will continue to be a customer in the future.
